channel.title: Ertugrul Demir on Ertugrul
channel.description: Recent content in Ertugrul Demir on Ertugrul

item.title: Data Science Portfolio Projects (30+)
item.description: I developed 30+ machine and deep learning projects which served as live web demo app on my huggingface account to prove my skills about data science. Source codes and detailed information about projects can also be found on my github account. NOTE THAT: if the demo page raises a 404 error, you can simply refresh the page to reset the project server. If refreshing the page does not work, you can also try the alternative demo app served on Google Colab.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Can reach me on these platforms. Platforms URL E-post: ertugrulbusiness@gmail.com Website: ertugruldmr.github.io LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/ertuğruldemir GitHub: github.com/ertugruldmr HuggingFace: huggingface.co/ErtugrulDemir Kaggle: kaggle.com/erturuldemir HackerRank: hackerrank.com/ertugrulbusiness StackOverFlow: Ertuğrul Demir Medium: medium.com/@ertugrulbusiness YouTube: Ertuğrul Demir Twitter: twitter.com/Ertugrul_DS
